itemDisplayName: Enterprise Risk Analysis solution stack with Datameer, HDInsight, TrendMicro and Chef
description: This push to pilot launches a business intelligence Hadoop stack demonstrating online transactions risk analysis, provides an automated provisioning, configuration and integration of Datameer and Azure HdInsight, TrendMicro DeepSecurity & Chef Server products ready for staging / preproduction environments.
summary: Enterprise Risk Analysis solution stack with Datameer, HDInsight, TrendMicro and Chef
